(US) 28k COPY N0.2J,29TH NOVEMBER., .19U8CABINETCOMMITTEES ON CIVIL SERVICE MAN-POWERNote by the Secretary of the CabinetThe Prime Minister has directed that theTreasury shall resume full responsibility for controlling the size of the Civil Service. the ministerial Committee on Civil Service Man-Power,set up in accordance with C.P.(h6) h315 has there-fore been disbanded. The Official Committee, setup to assist the Ministerial Committee and preparematerial for it, will also cease to exist as aCabinet committee It will be the responsibilityof the Treasury to arrange for such inter-departmental consultations between officials asmay be necessary.(Signed) NORMAN brook cabinet Office, S.V7*l.-.*29th November, 19h8,
